channel.title: One handed weapons into two handed weapons
channel.description:
all my two handed weapons are one handed
how do i change this?
I honestly have no idea what to look for. :|

item.title: One handed weapons into two handed weapons
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

supra s:

u have to change the “model”, u have to add a second wep urself with modeling

I think he means, that his, for example, rune 2h swords, wields as a one handed weapon.

@TOPIC - Typically in alot of servers these days, or at least ones ive looked at, there is a thing in client.java that holds what weapons are 2h. The most common name for it is, “twohanded” or “twohand”. I have found it once being called “noshieldwep”. Just look from where the other 2h weapons ID’s are, and you will find it somewhere.

Read full topic
